Docs.param: The blob to delete's primary endpoint.
Specifies options for deleting blob snapshots.
Optional to add conditions on deleting this blob.
Docs.summary:
The operation marks the specified blob or snapshot for deletion. The blob is later deleted during garbage collection.
Note that in order to delete a blob, you must delete all of its snapshots. You can delete both at the same time using .
For more information, see .
Docs.returns: A on successfully deleting. The response cannot be used until the batch has been submitted with .

Docs.param: Indicates the tier to be set on the blob.
Optional Indicates the priority with which to rehydrate an archived blob.
Optional to add conditions on setting the access tier.
Docs.summary:
The operation sets the tier on a blob. The operation is allowed on block blobs in a blob storage or general purpose v2 account.
A block blob's tier determines Hot/Cool/Archive storage type. This operation does not update the blob's ETag. For detailed information about block blob level tiering .
Docs.returns: A on successfully deleting. The response cannot be used until the batch has been submitted with .

The operation sets the tier on a blob. The operation is allowed on block blobs in a blob storage or general purpose v2 account.
A block blob's tier determines Hot/Cool/Archive storage type. This operation does not update the blob's ETag. For detailed information about block blob level tiering .
